text: The Citroën C6 is a car produced by Citroën. It replaced the XM in 2005 which ended production in 2000. There was only a saloon model available and sales were slow throughout its production life and was discontinued in 2012. This car was used by former French presidents Jacques Chirac and Nicolas Sarkozy, and from 2012 by François Hollande. Category:Front wheel drive vehicles C6 Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Citroën C6
